books.title: Fundamentals of Classical Mechanics
books.author: Dr. Ahmad Al-Kindi
books.description: A comprehensive introduction to classical mechanics covering Newtonian dynamics, conservation laws, rotational motion, and oscillations with modern applications.

books.title: Quantum Physics: Principles and Applications
books.author: Prof. Fatima Al-Haytham
books.description: An advanced textbook exploring quantum mechanics, wave functions, uncertainty principles, and quantum applications in modern technology.

books.title: Stellar Astrophysics and Galactic Structure
books.author: Dr. Omar Al-Battani
books.description: Explores stellar evolution, galactic dynamics, and cosmological structures with emphasis on observational techniques and theoretical frameworks.

books.title: Mastering Modern Web Development
books.author: Sarah Thompson
books.description: Covers modern web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and frameworks like React and Next.js with real-world projects.

books.title: The World of Quantum Physics
books.author: Dr. Lina El-Sharif
books.description: An accessible guide to quantum theory, its principles, paradoxes, and the technologies it enables such as quantum computing.

books.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
books.author: Prof. Khaled Mansour
books.description: Explores the fundamentals of AI, machine learning, and neural networks with practical coding examples in Python.

books.title: History of the Islamic Golden Age
books.author: Dr. Omar Ibn Faris
books.description: A detailed historical account of the Islamic Golden Age covering scientific, cultural, and philosophical achievements.

books.title: Advanced Data Structures & Algorithms
books.author: Dr. Reem Haddad
books.description: In-depth exploration of data structures and algorithms with implementation examples in C++ and Java.

books.title: Arabic Poetry: A Journey Through Time
books.author: Dr. Noura Al-Hassan
books.description: An anthology of Arabic poetry spanning pre-Islamic, Umayyad, Abbasid, and modern eras with commentary.

books.title: The Art of UI/UX Design
books.author: Maya Al-Taher
books.description: A designer's handbook for creating user-friendly and visually appealing digital products using modern design principles.

books.title: Global Economics in the 21st Century
books.author: Dr. Hassan Al-Rashid
books.description: Analyzes the challenges and opportunities of global economics including trade, digital currencies, and sustainability.

books.title: Health and Nutrition Essentials
books.author: Layla Abu Salem
books.description: A practical guide on healthy eating, balanced diets, and lifestyle changes backed by medical research.
